entry.title: WIND WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:08 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: WSW 46 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
